an4.43:1.3: Kodhagaru na saddhammagaru, makkhagaru na saddhammagaru, labhagaru na saddhammagaru, sakkaragaru na saddhammagaru.
an4.43:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an4.43:2.1: Cattarome, bhikkhave, puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an4.43:2.3: Saddhammagaru na kodhagaru, saddhammagaru na makkhagaru, saddhammagaru na labhagaru, saddhammagaru na sakkaragaru.
an4.43:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasminti.
